TextBlock.Text: DAZ: Welcome to Giant's Deep, friends! This is the workshop where I design scrolls and projection stones for our clan to transcribe and transport information in compact forms.
DAZ: If you are here to inquire about the memory statues, kindly seek Phlox in the Statue Workshop below in my absence.
DAZ: However, if you seek my expertise in crafting new projection stones, scrolls - or wish to test out a new type of projection stone - feel free to seek me in my workshop upstairs!
PHLOX: Daz, I was only responsible for the memory statues' exteriors! You designed the memory storage system - how terrible of you to direct such intricate queries to me!
AVENS: I have to wonder if my brilliant brother's voyager stones would be finished by now, if only he could take less breaks to visit his lover at the <color=orange>Construction Yard..</color>
